transArray.content: The location of the hotel is quite secluded, the environment is pretty good, and it's very clean. The fried dough sticks and noodles for breakfast are pretty good, and they have basically everything you need every day.

Dear guest, if your smile has color, you are colorful. The inside is crystal clear, like dewdrops on green leaves in the morning, I want to touch it with my hands. But when you smile, itâ€™s the warm sunrise that makes people feel like spring. I love you, little man.
